title: RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)
description: Query → Retrieve Documents → Embed Context → Generate Response → LLM Output

advanced.code:
graph LR
    A[User Query] --> B[Embed Query]
    B --> C[Vector Search]
    C --> D[Retrieve Top-K Docs]
    D --> E[Rank by Relevance]
    E --> F[Build Context]
    F --> G[Prompt LLM]
    G --> H[Generate Response]
    H --> I[Cite Sources]
    I --> J[Return to User]
